channel.title: Shadows in Munich : Mage the Ascension (1-9)
channel.description:
**Shadows in Munich : Mage the Ascension**
**Location** : Munich, Germany - 2015 **Genre** : Investigation/Rival Factions, not Action movie/escalation. **Touchstones** : Being Human, Dresden Files, Lost Girl, Neverwhere, Rivers of London.
This is part of a series, attendance at more than one session is prefered but not mandatory.
Previous experience with World of Darkness is not required. I have ran plenty of games, but not Mage the Ascension before so I shall ease into things.
- No Racism, Sexism or Homophobia. - X-Card will be available. - This series will be recorded for youtube.
If you have any questions hit me up on gauntlet slack, forums or twitter @flyingfox369
• Climate : Cold, moderately snowy winters and mild to warm summers. • Trains : S-Bahn (above ground) U-Bahn (subway) • Munich shifted from heavy to light industry, to the manufacture, for example, of precision instruments, optical and electrical appliances, aerospace and other high-technology products, as well as to the production of food, cosmetics, and clothing. • Largest Employers : Allianz, Uni of Munich, BMW, Man (engineering), Munich Airport.
1-https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NIznMRy9gXDOlp5RjJV 2-https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NIznd_xeUf-bFk6-Zrk 3-https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NIzny6qgYIvGUy3Le6s 4-https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NIzoBfadee1YRxFBDVQ 5-https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NIzoRN6CreHVBTZFvz1 6-https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NIzodJ57aFdoHrxEs4O 7-https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NIzp1iunpFu8OPVq6tL 8-https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NIzpOMipncyNboirAZV 9-https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NIzpbhM0qlAug7F0gVk
Playsheet - https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1-47ezAB-TBm5ogUaLiZsSyJ8kD3CX3dy/edit?usp=share_link&ouid=106479707653253486950&rtpof=true&sd=true
Starting Spheres 6, 1 must go in Tradition/Craft affinity. Freebie Points : 15. Starting Arete 1 point. Starting Willpower 5 points. Starting Background 7 points.
If you want pregens - Akashyana - https://drive.google.com/file/d/1t4je3jEaE4Pv1Qew5iP_4ZtAKJa2Jyar/view?usp=share_link Cult of Ecstacy - https://drive.google.com/file/d/1p7uzgBMkwq_wnndPUSHK5Wr5LvvxVJfR/view?usp=share_link Dream Speakers - https://drive.google.com/file/d/1XRLJjop8kfkxTyR6-KW-hTcJwKdH1kzT/view?usp=share_link Sisters of Hippolyta - https://drive.google.com/file/d/18x8TPR48odPSD09AZDFzH7npIEGxvVWU/view?usp=share_link Taftani - https://drive.google.com/file/d/1OOddqI34YRTE8Z-5fO52tv7RO-nyWy8F/view?usp=share_link Verbena - https://drive.google.com/file/d/1y7o3ixYwDaetPtICQbP1uRmvJVmKvovv/view?usp=share_link

item.title: Shadows in Munich : Mage the Ascension (1-9)
item.dc:creator: @BlakeRyan
item.description:
@BlakeRyan wrote:

Shadows in Munich : Mage the Ascension

Location : Munich, Germany - 2015
Genre : Investigation/Rival Factions, not Action movie/escalation.
Touchstones : Being Human, Dresden Files, Lost Girl, Neverwhere, Rivers of London.

This is part of a series, attendance at more than one session is prefered but not mandatory.

Previous experience with World of Darkness is not required.
I have ran plenty of games, but not Mage the Ascension before so I shall ease into things.

  • No Racism, Sexism or Homophobia.
  • X-Card will be available.
  • This series will be recorded for youtube.

If you have any questions hit me up on gauntlet slack, forums or twitter @flyingfox369

• Climate : Cold, moderately snowy winters and mild to warm summers.
• Trains : S-Bahn (above ground) U-Bahn (subway)
• Munich shifted from heavy to light industry, to the manufacture, for example, of precision instruments, optical and electrical appliances, aerospace and other high-technology products, as well as to the production of food, cosmetics, and clothing.
• Largest Employers : Allianz, Uni of Munich, BMW, Man (engineering), Munich Airport.

1-https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NIznMRy9gXDOlp5RjJV
2-https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NIznd_xeUf-bFk6-Zrk

Playsheet - https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1-47ezAB-TBm5ogUaLiZsSyJ8kD3CX3dy/edit?usp=share_link&ouid=106479707653253486950&rtpof=true&sd=true

Starting Spheres 6, 1 must go in Tradition/Craft affinity. Freebie Points : 15.
Starting Arete 1 point. Starting Willpower 5 points. Starting Background 7 points.
